669790.name: Starlines
669790.description:
Embark on an adventure to uncharted stars and planets with a beautiful companion by your side. Explore the vast unknown cosmos together, discovering new wonders and forging unforgettable memories amidst the infinite beauty of the universe. Let the stardust guide your paths as you journey through the celestial tapestry, sharing smiles, laughter, and moments of awe in the boundless expanse of space. Together, you will weave a tale of love and exploration that transcends time and space, painting the universe with the colors of your shared dreams and aspirations. So set sail among the stars, hand in hand, and let the magic of the cosmos envelop you on this wondrous journey of love and discovery.

Gameplay:
Starlines offers a tactical puzzle where you have to connect all the star lines with a single beam! With over 80 levels, 3 unique canvases, and most importantly, stunning illustrations as rewards for completing each level, immerse yourself fully in the captivating atmosphere of STARLINES!
